featured.text: The development of fork-related table manners.

other.text: They periodically stopped their conversations to switch tables so the insights and ideas might 13 and deepen.

By the 7th century A.D., royal courts of the Middle East began to use forks at the table for dining.
The Table Where Rich People Sit.

definition.zh_def: 一種平坦的表面，通常用於放置物品或進行活動的家具。
definition.en_def: A flat surface, typically supported by one or more legs, used for placing items or performing activities.
definition.example: We gathered around the table for dinner.
